name: Widget Games - Widget Garden
description:
Play new iOS 14 widget game on your home screen! Play Widget Garden, the first iOS 14 widget game in the world! Enjoy a relaxing garden game. Grow beautiful flowers and plants on your home screen. Transform your home screen into a vibrant garden. Customize, design and have fun. Aesthetic, simple and easy. Feel just like growing real flowers and plants, but without the hassle and hard work.
Relax, enjoy and get happy! Spread the love!
Get your stylish Widget Garden widgets and share with your friends and family.
Download now!
